Posts.Content: Dec 2, 2011 02:12AM renee31 wrote: I work nights and wear a mask. I just finished chemo 11/8. I wasÂ  prn before being dx so I only had to fulfill 48 hrs a month to keep my position. I did get my flu shot ( while on chemo) and wore a mask at all times. Patients would freak when I came in with a mask but I would tell them I had a relative at home that had a weakened immune system and I was protecting them. I did'nt feel It was appropriate to tell them I have cancer. I start radiation next week and still plan on working my minimum requirements at night.
Posts.Title: Medical professionals working through chemo socbamom renee31
